name: Idiopathic Systemic Capillary Leak Syndrome (ISCLS)
chief_complaint: I feel like I'm swelling up and can't breathe
prognosis: Guarded - mortality rate up to 30% in acute episodes. Survivors often have recurrent episodes.
description: A rare, life-threatening condition characterized by recurrent episodes of capillary hyperpermeability leading to massive fluid shifts from intravascular to extravascular space. The pathophysiology involves unknown triggers causing endothelial dysfunction. Often misdiagnosed as sepsis or anaphylaxis initially.
